name: weather-agent-kd
description: Weather agent using Mastra with MCP tools to upload tts audio files to mux.

scripts.test:stt:deepgram: npm run build && tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-stt.ts files/sample.wav deepgram
scripts.test:stt:cartesia: npm run build && tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-stt.ts files/sample.wav cartesia
scripts.test:tts:deepgram: npm run build && tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-tts.ts "Hello from Deepgram" deepgram
scripts.test:tts:cartesia: npm run build && tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-tts.ts "Hello from Cartesia" cartesia
